com.facebook.fbui.textlayoutbuilder

Annotation Type TextLayoutBuilder.MeasureMode


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
public static @interface TextLayoutBuilder.MeasureMode
    Measure mode constants similar to View.MeasureSpec
    See Also:
    TextLayoutBuilder.MEASURE_MODE_UNSPECIFIED, TextLayoutBuilder.MEASURE_MODE_EXACTLY, TextLayoutBuilder.MEASURE_MODE_AT_MOST
